titles.title: Truth in Savings Amendments of 1993
To amend the Truth in Savings Act to delay the effective date of certain regulations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 4/21/1993--Introduced. Truth in Savings Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Truth in Savings Act to delay to 15 months after publication in final form (currently nine months) the effective date for specified regulations pertaining to the uniform disclosure of interest rates and fees on depository accounts.
